verses.plain: Hear my prayer, O LORD, and let my cry come unto thee.

tokens.t: Hear my prayer, O
, and let my cry come unto thee.

verses.plain: Hide not thy face from me in the day when I am in trouble; incline thine ear unto me: in the day when I call answer me speedily.

tokens.t: Hide not thy face from me in the day
I am in trouble; incline thine ear unto me: in the day
I call answer me speedily.

verses.plain: For my days are consumed like smoke, and my bones are burned as an hearth.

tokens.t: For my days are consumed like smoke, and my bones are burned as an hearth.

verses.plain: My heart is smitten, and withered like grass; so that I forget to eat my bread.

tokens.t: My heart is smitten, and withered like grass; so that I forget to eat my bread.

verses.plain: By reason of the voice of my groaning my bones cleave to my skin.

tokens.t: By reason of the voice of my groaning my bones cleave to my skin.

verses.plain: I am like a pelican of the wilderness: I am like an owl of the desert.

tokens.t: I am like a pelican of the wilderness: I am like an owl of the desert.

verses.plain: I watch, and am as a sparrow alone upon the house top.

tokens.t: I watch, and am as a sparrow alone upon the house top.

verses.plain: Mine enemies reproach me all the day; and they that are mad against me are sworn against me.

tokens.t: Mine enemies reproach me all the day;
they that are mad against me are sworn against me.

verses.plain: For I have eaten ashes like bread, and mingled my drink with weeping,

tokens.t: For I have eaten ashes like bread, and mingled my drink with weeping,

verses.plain: Because of thine indignation and thy wrath: for thou hast lifted me up, and cast me down.

tokens.t: Because of thine indignation and thy wrath: for thou hast lifted me up, and cast me down.

verses.plain: My days are like a shadow that declineth; and I am withered like grass.

tokens.t: My days
like a shadow that declineth; and I am withered like grass.

verses.plain: But thou, O LORD, shalt endure for ever; and thy remembrance unto all generations.

tokens.t: But thou, O
, shalt endure for ever; and thy remembrance unto all generations.

verses.plain: Thou shalt arise, and have mercy upon Zion: for the time to favour her, yea, the set time, is come.

tokens.t: Thou shalt arise,
have mercy upon Zion: for the time to favour her, yea, the set time, is come.

verses.plain: For thy servants take pleasure in her stones, and favour the dust thereof.

tokens.t: For thy servants take pleasure in her stones, and favour the dust thereof.

verses.plain: So the heathen shall fear the name of the LORD, and all the kings of the earth thy glory.

tokens.t: So the heathen shall fear the name of the
, and all the kings of the earth thy glory.

verses.plain: When the LORD shall build up Zion, he shall appear in his glory.

tokens.t: When the
shall build up Zion, he shall appear in his glory.

verses.plain: He will regard the prayer of the destitute, and not despise their prayer.

tokens.t: He will regard the prayer of the destitute, and not despise their prayer.

verses.plain: This shall be written for the generation to come: and the people which shall be created shall praise the LORD.

tokens.t: This shall be written for the generation to come: and the people which shall be created shall praise the

verses.plain: For he hath looked down from the height of his sanctuary; from heaven did the LORD behold the earth;

tokens.t: For he hath looked down from the height of his sanctuary; from heaven did the
behold the earth;

verses.plain: To hear the groaning of the prisoner; to loose those that are appointed to death;

tokens.t: To hear the groaning of the prisoner; to loose those that are appointed to death;

verses.plain: To declare the name of the LORD in Zion, and his praise in Jerusalem;

tokens.t: To declare the name of the
in Zion, and his praise in Jerusalem;

verses.plain: When the people are gathered together, and the kingdoms, to serve the LORD.

tokens.t: When the people are gathered together, and the kingdoms, to serve the

verses.plain: He weakened my strength in the way; he shortened my days.

tokens.t: He weakened my strength in the way; he shortened my days.

verses.plain: I said, O my God, take me not away in the midst of my days: thy years are throughout all generations.

tokens.t: I said, O my God, take me not away in the midst of my days: thy years
throughout all generations.

verses.plain: Of old hast thou laid the foundation of the earth: and the heavens are the work of thy hands.

tokens.t: Of old hast thou laid the foundation of the earth: and the heavens
the work of thy hands.

verses.plain: They shall perish, but thou shalt endure: yea, all of them shall wax old like a garment; as a vesture shalt thou change them, and they shall be changed:

tokens.t: They shall perish, but thou shalt endure: yea, all of them shall wax old like a garment; as a vesture shalt thou change them, and they shall be changed:

verses.plain: But thou art the same, and thy years shall have no end.

tokens.t: But thou
the same, and thy years shall have no end.

verses.plain: The children of thy servants shall continue, and their seed shall be established before thee.

tokens.t: The children of thy servants shall continue, and their seed shall be established before thee.

footnotes.text: like…: or, (as some read) into smoke
those…: Heb. the children of death
